thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com
thread.title: Jeroen

author: Jeroen
title: Jeroen
text: I was very skeptical about an organisation that promised me a better rate than PayPal or any other international money transfer firm. Turned out they were right. The rate from OFX for a 5-digit sum of AUD to EURO was about 0.6% under the rate on XE.com, but did not come with any other transaction costs. It cost me a few hundred Euro to transfer the whole sum and got it on my European account well within three working days.
